stories.title: Create Project
stories.description: As a user, I want to create a new project so that I can organize related tasks.

stories.title: Add Task to Project
stories.description: As a user, I want to add tasks to a project so that I can define the work needed.

stories.title: Assign Task to Team Member
stories.description: As a user, I want to assign a task to a team member so that responsibility is clear.

stories.title: Set Task Deadline
stories.description: As a user, I want to set a deadline for a task so that we can track timelines.

stories.title: Update Task Status
stories.description: As a user, I want to update a task's status so that progress is visible.

stories.title: Kanban Board Drag-and-Drop
stories.description: As a user, I want to drag and drop tasks on a Kanban board so that I can manage workflow visually.

stories.title: View Project Progress
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a progress percentage per project so that I can track completion.

stories.title: Filter Tasks by Assignee
stories.description: As a user, I want to filter tasks by assignee so that I can see individual workloads.

stories.title: Highlight Overdue Tasks
stories.description: As a user, I want overdue tasks highlighted so that I can identify delays quickly.

summary: A project management tool enabling users to create projects, manage tasks with assignments and deadlines, track progress via a Kanban board, and filter/highlight tasks for efficient workflow oversight.
